61.eng-name: Virtues and Merits of the Prophet (pbuh) and his Companions

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "I have been sent (as an Apostle) in the best of all the generations of Adam's offspring since their Creation

chapter.ara-name: باب صِفَةِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم
